Professor David Wallace smashes through a phone booth to introduce this year’s course 2.009 (Product Engineering Processes) theme: super! Groups of mechanical engineering students will work together to design and build working prototypes of new products around this theme #MIT #009mit #engineering
What better way to introduce yourself to your teammates other than BALLOONS! #009mit #009balloons

In addition to keeping the theme super secret, the reveal set also had a bunch of secrets!... including well-planned 0.5-inch clearances for doors/elevators, trays and fans for water and dry ice, last-minute wiring and assembly, two car batteries, a confetti canon that slid into place, and a tiny shelf for Georgia's laptop! 🎊

#super009 #009mit
